metadata.description: Written by Mark Poulton (Savage Hawkman, Avengelyne) with art by Jim Hanna and Marat Mychaels (Deadpool Corps, Grifter), Spotlight is Entourage meets the Justice League. As Spotlight, Tyler James is Hollywood's brightest star. He Navigates the challenges of celebrity and being a superhero with a close knit group of friends until a girl enters the inner circle, putting a strain on the relationship between him and his best friend, Mikey. Now, that jealousy has reared its ugly head, Spotlight soon learns the cost of fame and finds out who his real friends truly are.
metadata.name: Spotlight
